name: diffnator
description: ğŸ”¥ DiffNator - The ultimate visual website comparison tool with live iframe, proxy, and screenshot modes. Perfect for visual regression testing and pixel-perfect comparisons.

scripts.restart: npm run stop && node -e "setTimeout(() => {}, 2000)" && npm start
scripts.test: echo 'No tests yet. Run npm start and test manually at http://localhost:8086'
scripts.health: node -e "require('http').get('http://localhost:8086/health', res => { let d=''; res.on('data', c => d+=c); res.on('end', () => console.log(d)); }).on('error', e => console.error(e));"
